The recent work by Tobias Bexte on “Engineering of potent CAR NK cells using non-viral Sleeping Beauty transposition from minimalistic DNA vectors“ from the research group of Evelyn Ullrich, Frankfurt, was awarded ["Paper of the Quarter Q2/24"](https://www.dg-gt.de/post/preisträger-q2-2024).
